name: European Association for the Study of the Liver
goal: EASL is a medical association dedicated to pursuing excellence in liver research, clinical practice of liver disorders, and in providing education to all those interested in hepatology. While the roots of the association were founded in Europe in 1966, EASL continues to engage globally with all stakeholders in the liver field wherever they are based. Our aim is to spread knowledge and expertise in best practices and the latest scientific breakthroughs in hepatology.
interests: Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: EU Health policy, food policy, EU Research policy, EASL raises awareness regarding liver disease
